metadataAttributes.Title: Connected Leadership
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course is designed to maximize your ability to create change at the individual, team and system levels. Through study, reflection, and deploying practical tools, you will establish a firm connection between your clearly articulated Purpose, effective Priorities, visualized Potential for success, and pathway to maximized Progress. But, what does that mean in practice?
metadataAttributes.Skills: Emotional Intelligence,Team Building,Systems Thinking,Leadership And Management,Team Management,
